title: Persona's 7 New Announcements - Kinda Funny Games Daily 07.13.21
description:
Greg and Gary Whitta delve into Persona's 25th Anniversary and it's seven new teases, sort through two delays, and yell at each other about nonsense. 

Time Stamps - 
00:00:00 - Start
00:04:13 - Housekeeping
A great PSILY is live! Kojima! Director’s Cut! Where the Heart Leads!
Thank you to our Patreon Producer Black Jack!
The Roper Report   -
00:06:15 -  Persona: 7 Upcoming Announcements For The Series, Darryn Bonthuys @ GameSpot
00:22:40 - Nickelodeon All-Star Brawl Announced, Skrebbels @ IGN
00:40:00 -  Ad
00:43:20 - Ghostwire Tokyo Delayed
00:44:06 - Just Cause Mobile Delayed
00:51:27 - ESA Talks COVID and Gaming, REB @ IGN
00:58:10 - BREAKING: The theme for Fall Guys Season 5 is JUNGLE ADVENTURE
01:01:00 -  RUMOR: PSU.com’s Michael Harradence
01:02:00 - Out today
01:07:29 - You‘re Wrong
Tomorrow’s Hosts: Blessing and Andy
